title: RDP Screen Size
author: bradyjay3
body_snippet:
I've noticed that RDP connections don't size the screen display/resolution correctly in windows 10.  If i have a high resolution but the zoom is set to 150% mRemoteNG doesn't pass that zoom through to the RDP session like Windows Remote Desktop will.  You can see the difference on how small the text is in mRemoteNG vs Windows RD
